name: The San Francisco Day Labor Program - Job Placement
description: General Labor: - $30 per hour, per person with a minimum of three hours Skilled Labor: - $30 - 40 per hour, per person & minimum of three hours $25 fee for cancelation within 24 hrs. All work is subject to a minimum service of 3 hours. Estimates available for complex projects. Call to confirm for most updated $ per hour.

howToGetIt: 1. In person: 3358 Cesar Chavez St. San Francisco, CA 94110 2. Call to hire - (415) 252-5375 - (415) 252-5376
